channel.title: Extinction-Pk version 2!@ Join now 667 Revision || Need staff || Unique Customs
channel.description:
Welcome Extinction version 2!
Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zezwdsrkeeqrn97/Extinction%20V2.jar ]
Webclient: (Coming Soon)
Yes indeed this is version 2 of Extinction!
My name is Rhys I’m Going to run the server with help from the previous owner of Extinction “Poanizer" We have worked so hard and put so much effort into this server, We're back and ready to work hard and bring you the best RSPS in Runescape history.
We offer not only a great rsps but we offer you an amazing community, PVP, PVM, Skilling Based server! With loads of new features,
Stuff we're working on: Pvp, Pvm, Skilling point system New bosses New minigames New skilling, Pvm, Pvp areas New barrows system new dungeoneering New kiln boss fight for Tokhaar-kal
PVP - i suggest you play extinction, Extinction provides No lag, No item dragging, 100% perfected switching, Amazing pking system.
PVM - We provide a wide range of bosses with our own customs, Such as avatar king, DKS, Wildy wyrm, Seatrollqueen, Kal'ger, World-Gorger, Ancient warriors, Nomad, Glod, New wilderness bosses,New minigame bosses to obtain great new armours!, New Donator/Extreme boss!
Skilling – Extinction has high xp rates therefore training is pretty fast for skilling/Combat, We’re adding new custom skilling zones for all skills and currently working on a new dungeoneering system!.
Server Event At 15 Players Online
-------------------------------------------------------------- Server staff:
Owner - [b]Devourz[/b]
Co-Owner - (Master kiwi) Co-Owner - (Poanizer)
Admin - (Closed)
Mod -(Closed) Mod -(Closed) Mod -(OPEN)
Player support - (Open) Player support - (Open) Player support - (Open)
Forum Mod/Developer - (Jeffatcsa) Forum Mod - (Closed)
Currently looking for staff - Do not! ask for staff, as it will decrease your chances of getting staff. More staff positions open as we get more players. ------------------------------------------------------
Server features:
* 24/7 Global Friends chat "Help" * Regular Updates * Amazing dedicated owners/coders! * Fast money making! * Fast leveling! * Comp/Max cape! * Jad 1 wave * All nex sets (Torva/Pernix/Virtus) * All chaotics! * Primal armour + Weapons! * Kiln cape (Tokhaar - kal) * Korasi sword! With 100% working spec! * Flawless Pvp - Perfect switching 100% hybridding! * Crystal keys for our amazing Ckey Treasure box! * Unique new home! (Under Construction) * Great skilling areas! * All 24 skills working! - With our own unique dungeoneering! * Donator zone! - (Extreme Donator zone Coming soon)! * Amazing donator benefits * Barrows brothers on hills! * All minigames - Barrows/Dominion tower/Castle wars/Duel arena. * Funpk zone! - Clanwars! - Safe portal (White) Unsafe portal (Red)! * Highscores! Coming soon!
--------------------------------------------------------
*Nex *All GWD *Corp *King Black Dragon *Queen Black Dragon *Jad - 1 Wave. *Bork *Kalphite Queen *Nomad *Troll Queen *DKS - Dagannoth Kings *Glacors *Jadinkos *Polypore *Ganodermic Beasts *Avatar Of Destruction *Chaos Elemental *Revs *Giant Mole *Kal'ger The Warmonger *Glod *Wildy Wyrm *Ice strykewyrms *World-Gorger *Lucien *Phoenix *Do No Evil Bosses *Enhanced Ice Titans *Bouncer
*Avatars Kings *Lucien *Kal'Ger Trio *Glod *New King black dragon area! *Wildy wyrm (Wilderness) *Giant mole (Wilderness) *Chaos elemental (Wilderness) *New Revs(Wilderness) *Donator boss *Respected Donator boss *Minigames: Boss Assualt, Zombies *Custom Fight Kiln cave
-----------------------------------------------------------
*Server Vote [X] *Server Donations [X]
So What Are You Waitting For? JOIN US NOW!!!

Welcome Extinction version 2!

Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zezwdsrkeeqrn97/Extinction%20V2.jar ]

Webclient: (Coming Soon)

Yes indeed this is version 2 of Extinction!

My name is Rhys I’m Going to run the server with help from the previous owner of Extinction “Poanizer"
We have worked so hard and put so much effort into this server, We’re back and ready to work hard and bring you the best RSPS in Runescape history.

We offer not only a great rsps but we offer you an amazing community, PVP, PVM, Skilling Based server! With loads of new features,

Stuff we’re working on:
Pvp, Pvm, Skilling point system
New bosses
New minigames

New barrows system
new dungeoneering
New kiln boss fight for Tokhaar-kal

PVP - i suggest you play extinction, Extinction provides No lag, No item dragging, 100% perfected switching, Amazing pking system.

PVM - We provide a wide range of bosses with our own customs, Such as avatar king, DKS, Wildy wyrm, Seatrollqueen, Kal’ger, World-Gorger, Ancient warriors, Nomad, Glod, New wilderness bosses,New minigame bosses to obtain great new armours!, New Donator/Extreme boss!

Skilling – Extinction has high xp rates therefore training is pretty fast for skilling/Combat, We’re adding new custom skilling zones for all skills and currently working on a new dungeoneering system!.
